bibl.title: Shaping a Muslim State: Papyri Related to a Mid-eighth-century Egyptian Official.
bibl.note: Diss. Princeton Univ. Summary in DA 65 (2004-2005) p. 2329-A. - Edition, translation and commentary of 37 Arabic papyrus letters from between A.D. 730 and 740 written and related to ‘Abd Allah b. As‘ad. Three analytical chapters offer synthetic studies of the political and economic processes that shaped early Islamic Egypt.
SIJPESTEIJN Petra Marie, Shaping a Muslim State: Papyri Related to a Mid-eighth-century Egyptian Official.
